verses.verse: <S%G1161>But<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G3004>says<s%> <S%G4490>expressly<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5306>later<s%> <S%G2540>times<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> will fall away <S%G868>from<s%> the <S%G4102>faith,<s%> paying attention <S%G4337>to<s%> <S%G4108>seducing<s%> <S%G4151>spirits<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1319>doctrines<s%> of <S%G1140>demons,<s%>
<S%G1722>through<s%> the <S%G5272>hypocrisy<s%> of men who speak <S%G5573>lies,<s%> <S%G2743>branded<s%> in <S%G2398>their<s%> own <S%G4893>conscience<s%> as with a hot <S%G2743>iron;<s%>

<S%G2967>forbidding<s%> <S%G1060>marriage<s%> and commanding to abstain <S%G567>from<s%> <S%G1033>foods<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2936>created<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> be <S%G3336>received<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G2169>thanksgiving<s%> by those who <S%G4103>believe<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1921>know<s%> the <S%G225>truth.<s%>

<S%G3754>For<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G2938>creature<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G2570>good,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> is to be <S%G579>rejected,<s%> if it is <S%G2983>received<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G2169>thanksgiving.<s%>

If you <S%G5294>instruct<s%> the <S%G80>brothers<s%> <S%G5294>of<s%> these <S%G5023>things,<s%> you will <S%G2071>be<s%> a <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G1249>servant<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> nourished <S%G1789>in<s%> the <S%G3056>words<s%> of the <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of the <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G1319>doctrine<s%> which you <S%G3739>have<s%> <S%G3877>followed.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G4984>bodily<s%> <S%G1129>exercise<s%> <S%G2076>has<s%> <S%G3641>some<s%> <S%G5624>value,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G2150>godliness<s%> has <S%G5624>value<s%> in all <S%G3956>things,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> the <S%G1860>promise<s%> of the <S%G2222>life<s%> which <S%G3568>is<s%> <S%G2532>now,<s%> and of that which <S%G3568>is<s%> to <S%G3195>come.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> to this <S%G5124>end<s%> <S%G2872>we<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G2872>labor<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> suffer <S%G3679>reproach,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> <S%G2872>we<s%> have set our <S%G1679>trust<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> the <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G4990>Savior<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G444>men,<s%> especially of those who <S%G4103>believe.<s%>

<S%G2706>Let<s%> no <S%G3367>man<s%> <S%G2706>despise<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G3503>youth;<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1096>be<s%> an <S%G5179>example<s%> to those who <S%G4103>believe,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3056>word,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> your <S%G1722>way<s%> of <S%G1722>life,<s%> in <S%G26>love,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4102>faith,<s%> and <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G47>purity.<s%>
<S%G2193>Until<s%> I <S%G2064>come,<s%> pay <S%G4337>attention<s%> to <S%G320>reading,<s%> to <S%G3874>exhortation,<s%> and to <S%G1319>teaching.<s%>

<S%G3361>Don't<s%> <S%G272>neglect<s%> the <S%G5486>gift<s%> that is <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4671>you,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> was <S%G1325>given<s%> to <S%G4671>you<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G4394>prophecy,<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> the laying <S%G1936>on<s%> of the <S%G5495>hands<s%> of the <S%G4244>elders.<s%>

Be <S%G3191>diligent<s%> in these <S%G5023>things.<s%> Give yourself <S%G2468>wholly<s%> <S%G1722>to<s%> <S%G5125>them,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G4297>progress<s%> <S%G5600>may<s%> be <S%G5318>revealed<s%> <S%G1722>to<s%> <S%G3956>all.<s%>

Pay attention <S%G1907>to<s%> <S%G4572>yourself,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to your <S%G1319>teaching.<s%> Continue <S%G1961>in<s%> these <S%G846>things,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> in <S%G4160>doing<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> you <S%G4982>will<s%> <S%G4982>save<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G4572>yourself<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> those who <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G4675>you.<s%>
